segment.source: Learn about how to install the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: Learn about how to install the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: Install the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Install the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Install the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Install the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: The Microsoft advertising libraries for Windows apps are included in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK.
segment.target: The Microsoft advertising libraries for Windows apps are included in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK.

segment.source: This SDK is an extension to Visual Studio 2015 and Visual Studio 2013.
segment.target: This SDK is an extension to Visual Studio 2015 and Visual Studio 2013.

segment.source: For installation instructions, see Monetize your app and engage customers with the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK.
segment.target: For installation instructions, see Monetize your app and engage customers with the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK.

segment.source: Note If you have installed Windows 10 Anniversary SDK Preview Build 14295 or later with Visual Studio 2015, you must also install the WinJS library if you want to add ads to a JavaScript/HTML app.
segment.target: Note If you have installed Windows 10 Anniversary SDK Preview Build 14295 or later with Visual Studio 2015, you must also install the WinJS library if you want to add ads to a JavaScript/HTML app.

segment.source: This library used to be included in previous versions of the Windows SDK for Windows 10, but starting with the Windows 10 Anniversary SDK Preview Build 14295 this library must be installed separately.
segment.target: This library used to be included in previous versions of the Windows SDK for Windows 10, but starting with the Windows 10 Anniversary SDK Preview Build 14295 this library must be installed separately.

segment.source: To install WinJS, see Get WinJS.
segment.target: To install WinJS, see Get WinJS.

segment.source: Library names for advertising and ad mediation
segment.target: Library names for advertising and ad mediation

segment.source: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK includes two sets of advertising libraries: the libraries for Microsoft advertising (which provide the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes for XAML and JavaScript/HTML apps) and the libraries for ad mediation libraries (which provide the AdMediatorControl class).
segment.target: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK includes two sets of advertising libraries: the libraries for Microsoft advertising (which provide the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes for XAML and JavaScript/HTML apps) and the libraries for ad mediation libraries (which provide the AdMediatorControl class).

segment.source: This documentation describes how to use the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries to display banner or video interstitial ads from Microsoft.
segment.target: This documentation describes how to use the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries to display banner or video interstitial ads from Microsoft.

segment.source: For information about using ad mediation, see Use ad mediation to maximize revenue.
segment.target: For information about using ad mediation, see Use ad mediation to maximize revenue.

segment.source: Before you can use the any of the advertising controls in your app code, you must reference the appropriate library in your project.
segment.target: Before you can use the any of the advertising controls in your app code, you must reference the appropriate library in your project.

segment.source: The following tables lists the names of each of the libraries in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK as they appear in in the Reference Manager dialog box in Visual Studio.
segment.target: The following tables lists the names of each of the libraries in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK as they appear in in the Reference Manager dialog box in Visual Studio.
